amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funding to a coastal state if there is a Federal moratorium on offshore leasing off the coast of that state.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 106-612 to allow those states which currently allow offshore drilling to receive the majority of the funding under Title I of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Regula amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 109 - 317 (Roll no. 160).
